title: Ticket #5421: startd should warn about obsolete STARTD_EXPRS only once per reconfig
description:
if the configuration uses both STARTD_EXPRS and STARTD_ATTRS a warning is writing to the StartLog each time a slot is created, When partitionable slots are used, this can happen very often.

The warning needs to be changed so that it is output only once per reconfig.
remarks:
2015-Dec-08 14:34:17 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Looks good

2015-Dec-14 16:40:19 by tim:
Just reduced log messages. Now version history needed.
